name: Vangogh Museum And Rijksmuseum
description:
Discover the two major museums of the city and follow the chronological path of art and its historical context. Concentrating on the Dutch Golden Age of its well-known artists during the XVIII & XIX century.

Access the two most important museums in the city of Amsterdam, Rijksmuseum and Van Gogh Museum, with our pre-booked admission ticket and skip the long queues to admire some of history's most famous artworks on this small group Tour.
